about_the_game:
In a land where different kingdoms wage wars for domination, you can become strongest ruler of them all.
Hex Kingdoms - a turn-based strategy game where you try to build the most prosperous and deadly nation that will rule the continent.
Build your cities, set up you defenses with walls and towers, train different units from knights, through mermans to deadly wind warriors.

Hex Kingdoms offer unlimited ways to play and enjoy the game with lots of content, maps and oldschool hotseat mode.



Features of the game:

- Hex based gameplay
Let your units move on hexes for ultimate victory.

- Fantasy theme set in a Medevial age
Train soldiers, knights and fighters or seek help from creatures like Lizardman or Merman.



- Hotseat mode
Engage your friends or fight with AI on same computer for endless fun.

- Unique elements and interactions
Search for hidden treasure chests on map or fight against neutral monsters.

- Advanced gameplay mechanics
Let your units gain experience from battles, build transport balloons to move across the land faster or manually operate you defensive towers.

- Fight on land, water and in air
Take your strategy skills to a new level with possibility to fight on different places.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Core i3 2x1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 128MB of video memory
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Core i5 2x2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 512MB of video memory
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: Hex Kingdoms is a turn-based strategy game set in medevial times with fantasy themes. Expand your kingdom, set up your defenses, train soldiers and monsters to become the only ruler of the land.
